Get all the ordinal stats

Source: R/ord_stats.R
tadaa_ord.Rd

Collects all ord_ statistics in neat output.

tadaa_ord(x, y = NULL, round = 2, print = "console")

Arguments

x

Dependent variable. Alternatively a table.
y

Independent variable
round

Ho many digits should be rounded. Default is 2.
print

Print method. Passed to pixiedust::sprinkle_print_method as of now.

Value

A dust object, depending on print.

See also

Other Tadaa-functions: tadaa_aov(), tadaa_chisq(), tadaa_kruskal(), tadaa_levene(), tadaa_nom(), tadaa_normtest(), tadaa_one_sample(), tadaa_pairwise_gh(), tadaa_pairwise_tukey(), tadaa_pairwise_t(), tadaa_t.test(), tadaa_wilcoxon()

Examples

tadaa_ord(ngo$leistung, ngo$begabung)
#>   Gamma D (x) D (y) D (xy) Tau A Tau B Tau C
#> 1  0.51   0.4   0.4    0.4   0.3   0.4  0.35
#> 
#>
